attributes.action: reduce the size of local and national government by insisting heads of departments achieve an RPI-x reduction in costs due to increased efficiency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Computers should have increased the efficiency of all administration and reduced the size of all local and central government departments (and tax bills with it). To achieve such a reduction all heads of departments, from permanent under secretaries to the heads of local authority departments, should be required to achieve savings in their departments of RPI-x (where x=a percentage saving). All those who fail to do so should be regarded as incompetent and downgraded for retraining or sacked.
